description.content:
Comprehensive API tests for WeSign Signer API (signerapi) - 3 active controllers

Created: 2025-11-02
Coverage: Identification (eIDAS/OAuth), OTP, SingleLink
Phases: Auth → Discovery → CRUD → Workflow → Edge Cases → Security → Cleanup

Note: LogsController has no active endpoints (commented out in code)
